Applications.title: Moderator
Applications.description: Help moderate the community and enforce rules.
questions: Why do you want this position?
Do you have previous moderation experience? If so, explain.

Applications.title: Builder
Applications.description: Create builds for events and showcases.
questions: What is your experience with building?
Share a link to your portfolio or previous builds.

Applications.title: Event Host
Applications.description: Run and host events for the community.
questions: Have you hosted events before? Describe one.
What ideas would you bring to our event schedule?
